name: Pocket Race: Manager
description:
Pocket Race: Manager is the latest indie game from Magic Storm, our hobby game developer team. It is a mini race driving game with simple controls and some strategic elements and lots of different car parts.

The game is being created using Unity and will support more platforms beside the windows pc later (android, maybe ios or game consoles).
The game is developed with German, English, French and spanish language support, like later followed by other languages, if the community supports us.
Every track has 2 qualification races. The two fastest drivers continue for the Final Race. 

Race with 1-4 human Players in 3 different Environments with a day/night cyle and different weather!

Make sure to enhance your car until you got the best one!
Hold the Accelerate Button to accelerate, release it to drive power-saving and decrease the motor heat. Quick-Tap to brake, or use the brake key on your PC keyboard. Attention: do not overheat!
It is very important to improve your car. Earn money to buy new parts with a successful qualification and a good place in a final race. Also win money from drawing cards. You also earn money from a good popularity. If you configure your car, keep an eye on weight and balance. Of course a light car is a bit faster, but if it gets too fast with a low balance it gets unstable and can even take off.
There is a Free/Test version with 4 tracks season, and for just 2.99€ a version with 12 tracks
and an additionl 12x2 tracks where you drive each track 2 times.

If you have any questions or need help concerning the game, you can ask us any time on our internet platform. Please visit us at the following website:
https://www.indiedb.com/company/magic-storm

(there is also the free/trial version with 4 tracks)
